analysis.description:
CoinvestToken (/unique_chucks/4/0x4306ce4a5d8b21ee158cb8396a4f6866f14d6ac8.sol#41-310) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/4/0x4306ce4a5d8b21ee158cb8396a4f6866f14d6ac8.sol#231-242)
empty in CoinvestToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/4/0x4306ce4a5d8b21ee158cb8396a4f6866f14d6ac8.sol#132-133) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in CoinvestToken.ERC20transfer (/unique_chucks/4/0x4306ce4a5d8b21ee158cb8396a4f6866f14d6ac8.sol#112) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in CoinvestToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/4/0x4306ce4a5d8b21ee158cb8396a4f6866f14d6ac8.sol#222) is a local variable never initialiazed

CoinvestToken.token_escape (/unique_chucks/4/0x4306ce4a5d8b21ee158cb8396a4f6866f14d6ac8.sol#245-256) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-lostToken.transfer(maintainer,stuckTokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0x4306ce4a5d8b21ee158cb8396a4f6866f14d6ac8.sol#255-256)
